title: Denzel Curry Announces 2025 “Mischievous South” World Tour
description: The Florida rapper will travel across North America, the UK/Europe, and Australia. Denzel Curry Announces 2025 “Mischievous South” World Tour Eddie Fu
author: Eddie Fu
excerpt: Denzel Curry has announced his 2025 "Mischievous South Tour" featuring dates across North America, the UK/Europe, and Australia.
text: Denzel Curry has announced an extensive 2025 world tour in support of King of the Mischievous South, the new “album version” of his recent project King of the Mischievous South Vol. 2. The North American leg will be supported by Kenny Mason, 454, and CLIP. The Florida rapper will kick off the tour in February with a brief run of Australia and New Zealand, which will be followed by North American dates in Atlanta, Nashville, New York City, Toronto, Chicago, Los Angeles, and many more between late March and early May. He’ll then close out the “Mischievous South Tour” with a UK/Europe leg. See the full schedule below. Get Denzel Curry Tickets Here Tickets will first be available Tuesday, November 19th through an artist pre-sale, which will be followed by a Live Nation pre-sale (use access code BEATS) for select dates beginning on Wednesday, November 20th. The general on-sale will then take place on Friday, November 22nd via Ticketmaster. King of the Mischievous South Vol. 2 (pick up your vinyl copy here) was released in July (when it was named a staff pick for best albums) as a sequel to his 2012 mixtape King of the Mischievous South Vol. 1. Meanwhile, the “album version” King of the Mischievous South repackages Vol. 2 with a handful of new tracks, including “STILL IN THE PAINT” and “GOT ME GEEKED.” Stream it over at Amazon Music Unlimited, which is currently offering a three-month free trial. Denzel Curry 2024-2025 Tour Dates: 12/15 – Miami Gardens, FL @ Rolling Loud Miami 02/21 – Brisbane, AU @ The Tivoli 02/22 – Sydney, AU @ The Hordern Pavilion 02/27 – Auckland, NZ @ Shed 10 03/01 – Wollongong, AU @ Yours & Owls Fest 03/02 – Melbourne, AU @ Palace Foreshore 03/04 – Perth, AU @ Metro City 03/31 – Phoenix, AZ @ The Van Buren 04/01 – Albuquerque, NM @ El Rey Theater 04/03 – Houston, TX @ Bayou Music Center 04/04 – Austin, TX @ Stubb’s Waller Creek Amphitheater 04/05 – Dallas, TX @ The Factory in Deep Ellum 04/08 – Tampa, FL @ Jannus Live 04/10 – Atlanta, GA @ The Eastern 04/11 – Raleigh, NC @ The Ritz 04/12 – Nashville, TN @ The Pinnacle 04/14 – Washington, DC @ The Fillmore Silver Springs 04/16 – New York, NY @ Terminal 5 04/17 – Boston, MA @ Roadrunner 04/18 – Philadelphia, PA @ Franklin Music Hall 04/20 – Toronto, ON @ HISTORY 04/21 – Pittsburgh, PA @ Stage AE 04/22 – Columbus, OH @ KEMBA Live! 04/24 – Detroit, MI @ Royal Oak Music Theatre 04/25 – Chicago, IL @ The Salt Shed 04/26 – Minneapolis, MN @ Fillmore Minneapolis presented by Affinity Plus 04/28 – Kansas City, MO @ Uptown Theater 04/30 – Salt Lake City, UT @ The Complex 05/02 – Seattle, WA @ Showbox SoDo 05/03 – Vancouver, BC @ PNE Forum 05/04 – Portland, OR @ McMenamins Crystal Ballroom 05/06 – Oakland, CA @ Fox Theater 05/09 – Los Angeles, CA @ Shrine Expo Hall 06/03 – Amsterdam, NL @ Melkweg Max 06/05 – Barcelona, ES @ Primavera Sound 06/09 – Prague, CZ @ Roxy 06/10 – Munich, DE @ Theaterfabrik 06/11 – Berlin, DE @ Huxleys 06/18 – London, UK @ O2 Academy Brixton 06/20 – Glasgow, UK @ O2 Academy Glasgow 06/23 – Dublin, IE @ National Stadium 07/01 – Frankfurt, DE @ Zoom 07/02 – Cologne, DE @ Carlswerk Victoria 07/03 – Vienna, AT @ Gasometer 07/07 – Vilnius, LT @ Lukiskes Prison 07/09 – Hamburg, DE @ Grosse Freiheit
html:
Denzel Curry has announced an extensive 2025 world tour in support of King of the Mischievous South, the new “album version” of his recent project King of the Mischievous South Vol. 2. The North American leg will be supported by Kenny Mason, 454, and CLIP.

The Florida rapper will kick off the tour in February with a brief run of Australia and New Zealand, which will be followed by North American dates in Atlanta, Nashville, New York City, Toronto, Chicago, Los Angeles, and many more between late March and early May. He’ll then close out the “Mischievous South Tour” with a UK/Europe leg. See the full schedule below.

Get Denzel Curry Tickets Here

Tickets will first be available Tuesday, November 19th through an artist pre-sale, which will be followed by a Live Nation pre-sale (use access code BEATS) for select dates beginning on Wednesday, November 20th. The general on-sale will then take place on Friday, November 22nd via Ticketmaster.

King of the Mischievous South Vol. 2 (pick up your vinyl copy here) was released in July (when it was named a staff pick for best albums) as a sequel to his 2012 mixtape King of the Mischievous South Vol. 1.

Meanwhile, the “album version” King of the Mischievous South repackages Vol. 2 with a handful of new tracks, including “STILL IN THE PAINT” and “GOT ME GEEKED.” Stream it over at Amazon Music Unlimited, which is currently offering a three-month free trial.

Denzel Curry 2024-2025 Tour Dates:
